text:
@SanirSayyed Confidential news leak

 Special flight to transport kudrati "CAMEL PEE" 4 AIMIM supporters 4m ME to cure covid19

Ps camel🐪 dung💩 cakes 🍩 too 🥄🍽️

Cc @sambitswaraj @ShefVaidya
